languages.text: "Вот именно — не пристало. Впредь следите за языком".

traits.locale_text: "Вот именно — не пристало. Впредь следите за языком".

languages.text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
languages.original_text: "Вот именно — не пристало. Впредь следите за языком".

traits.locale_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
"Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
"Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
"Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
"Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

languages.text: "Wohl wahr. Ich möchte Euch daher bitten, dass Ihr in Zukunft darauf achtet, was Ihr sagt."
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

traits.locale_text: "Wohl wahr. Ich möchte Euch daher bitten, dass Ihr in Zukunft darauf achtet, was Ihr sagt."

languages.text: « Tout à fait. Je vous prierai donc de surveiller votre langue à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

traits.locale_text: « Tout à fait. Je vous prierai donc de surveiller votre langue à l'avenir. »

languages.text: “你自己知道就好。从今往后，希望你谨言慎行。”
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

traits.locale_text: “你自己知道就好。从今往后，希望你谨言慎行。”

languages.text: 「確かにそうだ。なので私はあなたに、これから何を話すかを気にしていただきたいと思う」
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

traits.locale_text: 「確かにそうだ。なので私はあなたに、これから何を話すかを気にしていただきたいと思う」

languages.text: «Muy bien. Así que le pido que tenga cuidado con lo que dice a partir de ahora».
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."

traits.locale_text: «Muy bien. Así que le pido que tenga cuidado con lo que dice a partir de ahora».

languages.text: "Aynen öyle. Bundan böyle ağzından çıkanı kulağın duysun lütfen."
languages.original_text: "Quite right. So I would ask that you mind what you say from now on."
